marklogic.body: Sarah I just wanted to give you a little more perspective on something.Â I'm Mexican, I think you already knew that, my parents are old school, meaning they believe in all the old traditions.Â I have 3 older siblings, they all got married at 18, all of them have been married, kids, divorced, married again and divorced.Â All within the first 5-6 years.Â I was the first to break that tradition in the family.Â I used to catch a lot of Heat for not getting married and having kids.Â Now they tell me they are Glad I didn't get married right away.Â I've enjoyed my life and I got to experience many things that I probably never would've done had I married right after high school.Â @ign-7d700fc2fc7b43ff493d9667cbbda9aa:disqus You're welcome, you have great advice.
